alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Periods of freezing drizzle will impact portions of central Flathead County through 230 PM MST... At 1254 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported an area of freezing drizzle in the flathead Valley and north of Flathead lake. HAZARD...Slick spots are developing on roads as periods of freezing drizzle continues in the flathead Valley. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Isolated portions of roads, especially overpasses and bridges, may become slippery due to a glaze of ice accumulation. Locations impacted include... Kalispell, Evergreen, Bigfork, Creston, and Somers. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 116 and 127. Highway 83 between mile markers 82 and 90. Highway 93 N between mile markers 100 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
